title: Conservation of Energy - K of rock from rot wheel

content.question: While passing point <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>, a student releases a small rock of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math>, which falls to the ground without hitting anything. Which of the following best represents the kinetic energy of the rock when it is at the same height as point <math alttext="D" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="one half m v squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi>m</mi><msup><mi>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>
